attributes.action: Restrict the powers of the mayor of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The mayor has overulled the wishes of those living in the extended congestion zone and not sought the views of those outside it.
He has also overulled the decisions of locally elected Councilors in three Boroughs objecting to a Tram service being imposed, despite petions to the relevant councilors objecting to such a move.
Local councillors in Ealing wish to improve the situation of residents and cut congestion by removing certain bus lanes and have been threatned with penalties as a result.
Please remove these powers from this man

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
